attributes.action: Investigate the potential harmful impact of Mosquito devices on Children & Young People in Cornwall.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present any member of the public can erect a Mosquito on a building, there is no legislation to prevent this course of action. The harmful impact on the hearing of children & young people is unknown, babies in particular have acute hearing and therefore the potential is higher.
There should be a process, perhaps through planning or licensing where the need to erect such devices is proved, but before that research must be carried out.
attributes.creator_name: Terry Lello - Lead Member for Children, Young People & Families

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
